#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t,n,f;
    cin >> t;
    while ( t-- ) {
          cin >> n >> f;
          if ( n == 1 ) {
               cout << "1" << endl;
               continue;
          }
          if ( f <= 2 ) {
               cout << "-1" << endl;
               continue;
          }
          int ans = 2*(n/2) + n-n/2;
          cout << ans << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
